message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that price is way too high for me.  I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for the product.

I understand that $20,000 might be a bit steep for you, but I believe the product is worth more than $10,000 to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16,000. This is my final offer for now.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $16,000 is still more than I'm looking to spend.  How about we meet in the middle again at $13,000?

I'm glad we're getting closer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $14,500. This is my last offer before considering other options.
Alice, you're tough!  I understand this item means a lot to you, but I have a budget. My last offer is $13,500.  If you can't do that, I'll have to consider my other options.
